The FastPrep family of benchtop instruments utilize bead-beating technology to lyse, homogenize and grind routine and difficult samples in 40 seconds or less.

FastDNA™ Spin Kit for Soil

Designed to efficiently isolate bacterial, fungal, plant and animal genomic DNA, this kit has everything you need to process up to 500 mg of soil or environmental samples.

DSS for Colitis and IBD Research

MP Bio's high quality and purity DSS is the most effective solution available for consistently inducing severe intestinal inflammation in animal models.

Trusted Radiation Monitoring For Over 40 Years

The TLD XBGN badge is a four element dosimeter monitoring ionizing radiation and is our most frequently used badge. The service provided measures the absorbed dose in matter and tissue and a report is published with a minimal dose of 10 mrem.

SafTest - Food Quality Testing

Freshness of incoming raw materials is critical to the quality of end products and determines the shelf-life of finished goods. The SafTest system is quick in determining freshness and quality without having to send samples to an external testing lab.
